metadata.title: CVE-2022-32983 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Knot Resolver through 5.5.1 may allow DNS cache poisoning when there is anattempt to limit forwarding actions by filters.

criterions.comment: knot-resolver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
